codeList:
$ git clone https://github.com/arc53/DocsGPT.git
$ cd DocsGPT
$ echo "\nlangchain-milvus==0.1.6" >> ./application/requirements.txt
  backend:
    build: ./application
    environment:
      - VECTOR_STORE=milvus
      - MILVUS_URI=...
      - MILVUS_TOKEN=...
  worker:
    build: ./application
    command: celery -A application.app.celery worker -l INFO -B
    environment:
      - VECTOR_STORE=milvus
      - MILVUS_URI=...
      - MILVUS_TOKEN=...
$ docker compose down

anchorList.label: 在 DocsGPT 中使用 Milvus
